name: officedev-microsoft-teams-samples-bot-cards-python
title: Bot Cards using Teams SDK
shortDescription: This bot sample for Teams demonstrates various card types including Adaptive Card Actions, Suggested Actions, Toggle Visibility Cards, and file upload capabilities using Teams SDK.
longDescription: This bot demonstrates multiple card types in Microsoft Teams using Teams SDK. It showcases Adaptive Card Actions (OpenURL, ShowCard, Submit), Suggested Actions with interactive buttons, Toggle Visibility Cards, and file upload with OneDrive integration.
